name: SWATTY!!
description:
Catch me if you can!!

This is an 8 bit game in which  the player tries to avoid being knocked out silly by emerging obstacles to reach home.

Flap, flap! Flap those tiny wings with all your might to escape the grasp of the hungry cat.

This is a simple game that just requires you to download the executable file at the bottom of the page.

 

Press the space bar to flap your wings.
